Package community.leaf.textchain.adventure

Interface TextProcessor

All Superinterfaces:
Function<String,​TextComponent>
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface TextProcessor extends Function<String,​TextComponent>
Converts a string into a text component.

  • Method Summary

    Static Methods
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static TextComponent
    legacyAmpersand​(String text)
    Creates a text component by parsing legacy ampersand-style color codes contained within the input string.
    static TextComponent
    none​(String text)
    Simply creates a text component containing the input string.

    andThen, apply, compose

  • Method Details

    • none

      static TextComponent none​(String text)
      Simply creates a text component containing the input string. The text isn't "processed" beyond that.
      Parameters:
      text - a string
      Returns:
      a new component containing the input text

    • legacyAmpersand

      static TextComponent legacyAmpersand​(String text)
      Creates a text component by parsing legacy ampersand-style color codes contained within the input string.
      Parameters:
      text - text containing legacy ampersand-style color codes
      Returns:
      a new component as a result of processing ampersand color codes
